title: Boostshop
description: A SaaS platform for businesses to manage their inventory, orders, and customers. This was my first project as a full-stack developer. I was responsible for the entire front-end and back-end development.

title: Winseller
description: This project is responsible to scrape data from different e-commerce websites and provide insight information to the app. This way, our prices and stock were always updated automatically from our suppliers.
